ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectImmigration Appeal Division Rules, 2022
PrecisIMMIGRATION APPEAL DIVISION RULES, 2022 in order to (1) organize the Rules by stage of appeal rather than by type of appeal; (2) reduce the time limits for providing the appeal record; (3) require procedural requests, disclosure, and witness information to be provided earlier in the appeal process; (4) prescribe how hearings are to be conducted and outline possible active adjudication approaches available to decision-makers; (5) require the Minister of Citizenship and Immigration's counsel to provide and update their contact details in case of a change without delay; (6) provide consistency in procedures and requirements in proceedings that are common to all Immigration and Refugee Board Divisions; (7) provide more direction on providing documents electronically; and (8) implement the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations recommendations.
